908130.name: pla_toon - Supporter Edition
908130.description:
pla_toon Supporter Edition:
This version allows you to further customize your characters appearance by choosing from hats such as hockey masks, spartan and football helmets, and more.
I made this version to thank the people who supported me thought the process of making this game.

What you get:
1. A key to the full game.
2. Hats:
- Baseball cap that says supporter on it.
- Spartan helmet.
- Football helmet.
- Hockey mask.
- Cowboy hat.
- Aviator hat with goggles.
- Top hat + Monocle
3. A menu (on in-game escape menu) to test early features (such as spawning a biplane to test flying it etc) before anybody else and give your feedback on them.
4. Access to the Supporter Edition Discord so you can vote on features for the game and give suggestions.
5. Help the game develop faster.
6. A reduced early adopter price.

Thank you to all who have already supported me in making this project a reality!
Braden (The Dev)
908130.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 匈牙利语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
